name: cnet.com, download.com - Disable video pop out
description: Disables the stupid, terrible, obnoxious pop-out video player that is currently plaguing cnet.com. NOTE: Unfortunately, a CSS style can't keep the video from autoplaying, but you can use the "Disable HTML5 Autoplay" Chrome extension to keep the video from playing.
